EmailTemplate.name: Media Request
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. Please feel free to touch base with our media agency who is in charge of compiling new opportunities and helping us make some decisions.
Contact Information:
Backbone Media
Mel Haupt
mel.haupt@backbonemedia.net
970.963.4873 ext 229

kate.ackerman@backbonemedia.net
970.963.4873 ext 167
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
